MetaData.MetaDataItem: This device is a smart light switch. It has 3 buttons, using 1 wire AC line. You can control the light from the remote or manually. Input AC power : 220V

Value.label: Interval reporting interval
Value.Help: If value is 0x258, The device reports temperature and humidity every 10 minutes.

Value.label: Report value due to temperature change rate
Value.Help: The value is set to 20 and If there is a change in temperature above 2 degrees, the temperature is reported regardless of the reporting period.

Value.label: Report value due to humidity change rate
Value.Help: he value is set to 10 and If there is a change in humidity above 10 %, the humidity is reported regardless of the reporting period.
